Flying
Auriclious, Leyline Collider is all colors.
Auriclious, Leyline Collider costs {1} less to cast for each color among permanents you control.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, add one mana of that spell's colors. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. Use this mana only for multicolored spells.
